Jason Cameron, Vice-President, #Communications and #PublicAffairs, Atomic Energy of Canada Limited @AECL_EACL, spoke at the @OECD_NEA's workshop on public #riskcommunication, sharing over 20 years of experience and lessons learnt with the participants. https://t.co/jm7sYxOdkw

The @OECD_NEA with the Nuclear Regulatory Authority of the Slovak Republic 🇸🇰 are holding a 3-day workshop in #Bratislava to help improve the effectiveness of #riskcommunication in order to enhance public understanding in the #nuclearsector. 

 ➡️https://t.co/pmj1Ubu2HT https://t.co/qjuiYCQ0L5
